dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1402 IH: Macadamia Tree Health Initiative
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Gabbard (for herself and Ms. Hanabusa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to provide for a macadamia tree health initiative, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Macadamia Tree Health Initiative.
Section 1672(d) of the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 (7 U.S.C. 5925(d)) is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: Research and extension grants may be made under this section for the purposes ofâ€”

subparagraph.text: developing and disseminating science-based tools and treatments to combat the macadamia felted coccid (Eriococcus ironsidei); and
establishing an areawide integrated pest management program in areas affected by, or areas at risk of being affected by, the macadamia felted coccid.
